title: League of Legends start problem.
body:
When i launch the game it shows the logo and then dissapear fast and the launcher won.t show up and in Task Manager it shows that are 2 or more "LoL Patcher"'s but nothing open. Someone can help me? 
Please riot help me with something.

replies.body: Multiple instances of league showing up in task manager is normal, but it sounds like your client might not have the right admin privileges so that it can run properly. Make sure that you updated your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for League, and you should be good to go.
